title: What is your opinion about Dr. Rangan in EEE department

comments.body: My personal opinion is that he is a professor of EEE and teaches in pesu!
Why you want to know. I'm curious you seem like a bits student by your post history
Dude are you the guy who was getting difficult to get girls in bits
Friend of mine was complaining, so wanted to know if only he feels so or everyone
Oh cause the subject he is teaching is ass. It's a problem with the subject not the teacher
